title: Reinforcement Learning: Super Mario Bros
description: Created a model to play Super Mario Bros using reinforcement learning. Trained the model to improve its gameplay by learning from actions and rewards. Used TensorFlow to build neural networks and visualized progress with gameplay videos.

title: Sentiment Analysis
description: Built a machine learning model to classify tweets as positive, negative, or neutral. Achieved 60% accuracy by preprocessing text data and using NLP techniques like NLTK and TF-IDF.

title: Voice Assistant
description: Developed a voice assistant using Python. Integrated text-to-speech and speech-to-text features, and automated web interactions for tasks like Wikipedia searches and music playback. Added APIs for news updates and jokes.

title: Flappy Bird
description: Created a clone of Flappy Bird using Unity and C#. Implemented game mechanics, physics, and scoring system to replicate the original game.

title: Data Visualization
description: Designed interactive dashboards using Tableau. Extracted and cleaned data with SQL, and created visualizations for healthcare and manufacturing databases to help stakeholders make informed decisions.

title: Painting Rock the Bull in Impressionist Style
description: Used Neural Style Transfer (NST) to create an impressionist-style painting of 'Rock the Bull.' Combined a content image with an artistic style using deep learning techniques.
